description:
Prints messages letter by letter, giving it a typewriter effect.

---

Tutorial -
To add typewriting text, just use "Show Text" command and tweak the parameters to your liking.

To remove text box, use "Remove A Picture" command. The ID of picture has to be same as ID of the box.
